argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lkrssv.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 2 |  | lkrssv.f | |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) |
| 3 |  | lkrssv.k | |- K = ( LKer ` W ) |
| 4 |  | lkrssv.w | |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) |
| 5 |  | lkrssv.g | |- ( ph -> G e. F ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( LSubSp ` W ) = ( LSubSp ` W ) |
| 7 | 2, 3, 6 | #P_lkrlss | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ G e. F ) -> ( K ` G ) e. ( LSubSp ` W ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 5, 7 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( K ` G ) e. ( LSubSp ` W ) ) |
| 9 | 1, 6 | #P_lssss | |- ( ( K ` G ) e. ( LSubSp ` W ) -> ( K ` G ) C_ V ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( K ` G ) C_ V ) |
